website_summaries.verdict: A relief cream with specialized ingredients for everyday use.
pros: Avoids the strong smell commonly associated with pain relief creams
Its main ingredient, emu oil, is naturally effective at deeply penetrating the skin
This soothes aches while leaving skin soft and moisturized
Great value for the amount of cream per container
cons: Users with serious aches and pains will want a stronger formula

website_summaries.verdict: Blue-Emu is a top-tier emu oil-based formula for relaxing aching muscles and dried out skin due to its larger 12oz container and array of skin-nourishing ingredients mixed in to its emu oil base.
pros: Includes emu oil and other skin-nourishing ingredients like mineral oil, glucosamine, and aloe vera gel
cons: Blue-Emu isn’t made exclusively from emu oil, but that shouldn’t matter unless you feel the need for pure emu oil

customer_reviews.title: Formula has changed a lot.
customer_reviews.text: The first ingredient has changed from Aloe Vera Gel to Water. Also, the older formula stated that it contained 7% Emu Oil, but the latest label doesn't specify any percentage. The ingredient list has changed quite a bit. I haven't used the new one long enough to assess it's efficacy. Just wanted to let people know about the formula changes.
customer_reviews.author: RamJacCorp

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I go through a jar in about a month. I have fibromyalgia and ache every day. It is pricey but his product works great and without an odor or greasiness. So it's worth the money. I would love to see it added to Subscribe & Save. I'm sure that I'm not the only buyer who use this cream often. Please add to Subscribe & Save.
customer_reviews.author: Afrika

customer_reviews.title: Best pain relief product ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only pain relief product that actually works and has no odor. First time users note it may take a week or two before you will feel complete relief but don't give up use it daily as often as needed. I have used this product for about 10 years and always have a spare on the shelf so I never run out.
customer_reviews.author: ReenaE

customer_reviews.title: long term user
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected. After two jars I have found this product to be amazing. I used to take up six ibuprofen for knee pain every day. I now only use pills every week or two after a really active day doing yard work. I have gotten great relief at night.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Hood

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t a bottle of hand lotion cost about 5 dollars ?
customer_reviews.text: This leaves your skin very soft and smooth . IF IT EVER HELPS WITH PAIN, EVEN SLIGHTLY, I’LL UPDATE THIS . It does seem you could spend less than 27 plus dollars for a skin lotion though , and spare the life of a cute Emu ( remember the guy from Australia who had the Emu puppet he wore on his hand and arm , really funny once on a Johnny Carson rerun ) . Oh well , live and learn as the old saying goes . I just wonder when I’ll start learning.
customer_reviews.author: J.L J

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff at good price from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff at good price from Amazon. Use a few drops of Deep Muscle (or your choice) essential oil & the combo makes my creaky joints and sore muscles happy. I have been doing this for a long time & do not intend to stop. - Dwight
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Blue EMU left me feeling blue
customer_reviews.text: I used this stuff religiously for a month, as did my wife, who happens to be suffering from the same shoulder pain. It had absolutely no effect on either of our shoulders whatsoever. I also used it simultaneously on an arthritic toe...nothing! As if that wasn't enuff, I tried it on my left thumb during the same period...an injury that has been bothering me since I had a prosthetic joint replacement 3 years ago...again...no relief at all. This product may work for some folks...I suspect maybe the employees at the BLU EMU plant, but it didn't do squat for me OR my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Useless- Company must of BOUGHT their positive reviews...
customer_reviews.text: First off, the blue dye is NOT healthy, secondly i prefer a minty smell over a sheep smell, & lastly - this does nothing for pain or aches. It's a fantastic sheepy lotion, but that's it. My god, I'm a dental hygienist & our topicals have more strength! I'm returning this ridiculous lotion & sticking to Salonpas.
customer_reviews.author: Rewa

customer_reviews.title: Zero results
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on positive reviews. I don't know if I received a poor batch, but this has done nothing for muscle aches. I gave it five uses within a two day period and no relief. It's a nice blue colored lotion at best. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Read the label. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. I just receieved this product today.why is it, that you always find out how to use it after you purchase it? It says, don't use with a heating pad. I need a heating pad. Don't use on swollen skin. I have swollen legs and feet. Use 2-3 times a day for two weeks, does that mean, it takes that long to work? We'll see. I will update this review. ,
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R.

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: 8/10/17. Surprisingly this stuff works. My wife has peripheral neuropathy and lots of pain in the lower legs all the time. Finding something to ease the pain, even slightly to permit sleep has been unsuccessful until we tried Blue-emu. She says it helps a lot. Buying the larger quantity jar from Amazon.com is more cost effective then the Safeway special order. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Thule1

customer_reviews.title: No smell, and he says it works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this stuff, and insists that it works on his arthritic hands. We've tried other products with zero results. But this one he says helps, and I'll believe him. All I know is that it doesn't smell, and I consider that a blessing!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette H

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing at all for me
customer_reviews.text: This is expensive hand cream! I've used it for weeks (4 or 5 times a day) and I can't tell when I'm using it or not. It does absolutely nothing. It is greaseless and has no strong odor, but it does not help the arthritis in my finger or knee. At least with the greasy, stinky stuff, it definitely gives some relief.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Works for peripheral neuropathy in feet
customer_reviews.text: I have tried dozens of creams & ointments to ease the burning, stabbing pain in the tops & bottoms of both feet. I ordered Blue Emu and after only two days of use (two applications a day, morning and early evening), I have noticed a huge improvement in how my feet feel! It is cooling and soothing - I am able to wear shoes & socks that used to torment me, and I can sleep more comfortably. I also tried it for arthritis in my thumb joint. No greasiness or odor at all -- I will definitely continue to use this!
customer_reviews.author: K. Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed. I bought the big tub as I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. I bought the big tub as I've been having all over joint pain and it didn't help even a little bit. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two (less sore) Thumbs Up!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Has made a difference in my neuropathy. For the first time in a long time, I have a sense of feeling...and the awful, burning nerve pain that used to hit the tops of my feet seems to be gone, or at the very least, greatly reduced. And I haven't even been applying it as often as they advise during the first two weeks of use. Also has helped with muscular pain in my upper arms, and pain in my wrists and fingers. Very glad I decided to try it!
customer_reviews.author: Alpha Dog

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: Ingredients are not at all what's listed in the Important Information Section
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely disappointed in the advertising of the ingredients in this product. I specifically checked the ingredients prior to placing this order. As shown in my picture of the actual product I received and the ingredients list the ingredients are nowhere close to what's advertised. The product I received had a ton of chemicals and junk in it including blue eyes and more. There isn't even any "aloe vera" in the product which is listed in the Ingredients under the section Important Information (see second picture). The picture of the product's actual ingredients is in the picture of the jar.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E. Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Really works, without smell and burn.  Soothing.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly, this product works. I thought anything I used for arthritis pain would have to burn and smell. Blue Emu does neither, but brings quick and long-lasting relief. I use it at bedtime and during the night. Very effective, and lets me get to sleep. The jar I bought is three times the size as the drugstore, but only twice the price. Good value and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Where have u been all my life? This does what it says it will ~ relieves aches, pain, stiffness. Doesn't do what it says it wont: smell. Truly amazing. So much so, I thought it was the placebo affect, at first. NOT so. I've told everyone I know about this product. Lucky are they that don't need this yet... guessing they will eventually. Truly as advertised, which is rare these days.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Love that it is greaseless, has no odor, feels light when applied. Really does help to reduce/eliminate pain. Used to buy it for my 94 yr old mother who suffered from arthritis and loved to smear herself in Vick's. I was so happy that she allowed me to replace it with this product. I have used it as well, and it really is effective. Had been recommended to me by my rheumatologist, whose practice was centered on using alternative medicines and supplements. He and his wife used it also. How's that for vouching for a product?
customer_reviews.author: SavvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Siatica
customer_reviews.text: I managed to find myself in pretty severe discomfort from sciatica - nerve pain. This arrived a couple of days after a trip to the ER for pain and has been a god send. while I don't think it can completely replace other forms of pain relief on initial injury, it definitely helps after the initial injury begins to heal. I use it 2-3 times a day - whenever my leg starts to bother me from moving around too much and it really helps me get through my day. It soaks in pretty quick and has no scent so it's easy to use at work.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: no odor BUT also did nothing
customer_reviews.text: True it has no odor but it also made zero difference in how I felt. I used this multiple time over a few days and it did nothing at all to relieve pain.
customer_reviews.author: Rattler

customer_reviews.title: BLUE-EMU SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a joke it did not do anything for my pain I've used it for about 7 weeks i probably would have gotten better results using mud
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: I admit to some skepticism when I read about Blue Emu. But I have been very pleasantly surprised at how well it has relieved the extreme pain in my shoulder. I am now comfortable enough to sleep at night with little interruption. That’s a Godsend. The product has no odor at all & it soaks in pretty quickly. I haven’t had any staining on my clothing, despite the neon blue color of the product in the jar. However, vegetarians & vegans must be warned the product actually does contain emu oil, so it would not be appropriate for their use.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: I don't believe it!
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe it. It works. Both hips are shot. I applied blue emu on one hip and the pain virtually stopped while the other hip still hurt. I applied it on the other hip and the pain went away. I'm shocked because I've been living with the pain for several years and finally it's gone.
customer_reviews.author: little davie

customer_reviews.title: It is better than anything else I have used
customer_reviews.text: EMU extra strength is better than any other product I have used for sciatica & arthritis. It allows me to sleep at least for a while. I did not give five stars because the relief often lasts for 3-4 hours. It has no odor which I and my partner appreciate. I can use it without having to massage it in, unlike other products (including cannibus creams). When you use as much cream as I do in a day, it can get to be really expensive, even when buying the 12 oz. container, which saves a considerable amount on Amazon. I have received more relief from this product than any other I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Soul

customer_reviews.title: Acts quickly and lasts several hours
customer_reviews.text: We were amazed at how quickly this works and how long the relief lasts. I rub it on my husband's back, and it almost immediately stops his low back pain (muscle spasm due to pressure on spinal nerves) and relief lasts for about 5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Will Definitely Continue to Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time using this cream, and I really like it. Not only does it help with my muscle strains (from sleeping years in an uncomfortable bed), but it is also a very good moisturizer. And it’s odor-free. I’m definitely going to keep this on a regular basis. Most things I try once, and rarely re-purchase, or go back to it, but this is gonna be a staple in my home. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B.

customer_reviews.title: My husband says it works
customer_reviews.text: This is for my husband. When he puts it on his hands, he said he feels a "zinging" feeling in his joints, like he can actually feel it soaking in and working, and then the pain stops very quickly. After putting it on every night at bed time, and sometimes in the middle of the day, his hands stopped hurting so much that he forgot to keep using it. About a week later, they starting hurting and swelling again, so now he will remember to keep using it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Twy J

customer_reviews.title: This Product Works!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to have the opportunity to rate this product. I am 75 years of age, and it has been over a year since I’ve had to have a series of steroid shots in my knees. I credit Blue-Emu for making me pain free—but I’ve used it twice a day for the past two years. You can’t just use it once or twice and expect the pain to go away, which is what most people tend to do. This is an absolutely wonderful product, as it keeps my knees in a condition to walk swiftly, and was afraid I would be facing knee surgery at some point. I don’t think that now with the help of Blue Emu.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Moser

customer_reviews.title: Emus are killed for their oil in this product
customer_reviews.text: You do realize that the emu is killed for their oil.. although meat they say doesn’t taste good.. so they are killed for this oil only.. I will stop buying because of this
customer_reviews.author: mary virginia gray

customer_reviews.title: I've used it for three years and will continue until I find something that works better.
customer_reviews.text: It helps to reduce pain in my neck and shoulders and sometimes in my lower back. However, the relief lasts for a couple of hours and then I have to re-apply the cream. Unlike some other analgesics, this one has no odor. I've used it for three years and will continue until I find something that works better.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Peterson

customer_reviews.title: This Blue EMU DOES WORK!  Best pain relief my wife and I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Blue Emu for months now. It does work on lower back pain, aching joints, knees, feet, elbows. Make sure you rub it in well. It will do the job. We tried Australian Cream and it didn't work at all for my wife and myself. Blue EMU is the best non greasy, non smelling pain cream around. Buying it in this quantity saves money. You get 4 oz in the regular size, this is a 12 oz size for just a few bucks more. Saves time going back and forth to purchase this item at your local drug store.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Safe pain relief for everything...my 84 year young Mom says...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years but about a year ago told my Mom...it works for me....I sent her some ...says she uses it on her feet, ankles, knees, hips, back, shoulders,elbows, wrists, hands and fingers...That's good enough for me...now sending 2 large jars at a time...she loves it !!!
customer_reviews.author: 12 string player

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Blu Emu now for a bit over 3 months. At the onset, I was having severe pain and incapacity it the last three fingers on both hands. I used to play guitar but have not done so in years because of the pain. After 3 months with Blue Emu, I am back to playing this instrument I have missed so much. I have read many reviews saying this product does not work but for me it has worked amazingly well. I think it comes down to what is causing your pain. It seems to me if the pain is bad enough, it would be worth the small amount to find possible relief.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain!!!
customer_reviews.text: It immediately lowered the swelling and pain in my knees! Also I had a terrible migraine with the pain radiating in the side of my neck & my back. It was unbearable pain. I used this & the pain was brought down to a tolerable level, which helped my migraine calm down too. I'm shocked! Only negative is that the smell is kinda odd. It doesn't smell bad, but definitely not a good smell. On a scale of 1-10 (1 is bad, 5 is neutral, 10 is good) I would say a 4. It's almost a neutral smell lol But TOTALLY WORTH IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elissa Davis

customer_reviews.title: Someone recommended this to me and I'm so thankful really helped ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a deep muscle injury I was going to physical therapy for. The pain medications and hot baths would help but still was in a constant pain. Someone recommended this to me and I'm so thankful really helped ease that pain and deep tightness so I could sleep at night. It is truly odorless which was nice compared to all the obnoxious minty odors that didn't work nearly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: My father in-law recommended I try this for the finger I broke a couple of years ago. It hurts every time it gets cold out and since I live in Montana it gets cold a lot. I didn't expect much relief but I thought I would order it and try it anyway. I can't believe how quickly it helped. The pain relief is almost immediate and lasts almost all day on one application. I don't have to take ibuprofen all day long anymore. No scent at all and absorbs into the skin without leaving sticky residue behind. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blue Emu - It Works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband started using this for his shoulder and suggested I give it a try. I've had hip pain that has stopped me from sleeping on the side, first just one side, then both, and it also causes me to, at times, walk with a slight limp. The first day I tried this I was able to sleep on my side. The hip pain was much less throughout the day and I walk more normally. I have absolutely no idea why it works but I honestly do not care. It does work and I'm so happy to be able to sleep on my side again and walk more normally. My suggestion is to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: It Really does help.
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic pain in my neck, lower back,both legs, both feet, and left arm and hand, I put in on in the morning and it lasts about 4 hours. I’ve tried many other brands and haven’t found anything else that works as Good!! This stuff is AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Williams

customer_reviews.title: temporary problem
customer_reviews.text: I unscrewed the top of the container off a little bit ago, and pulled up on the tab that ws underneath that was supposed to pull off the plastic membrane that covers up the contents inside so I can start using the product. However the tab broke off when I pulled up on it and I had to cut the plastic membrane covering the contents inside around the edge with a knife in order to get it off. Which wasn't all that easy; it's no wonder that the tab that was supposed to pull off the plastic membrane broke. After I got the whole membrane that was covering the contents inside off, everything is okay. Desperado
customer_reviews.author: Desperado

customer_reviews.title: helped tremendously!!!
customer_reviews.text: some time soon I will have to have a knee replacement, but I can honestly say this has helped me the most of anything for my arthritic knee and other joints...I had to bend my knee sideways to walk without pain, and had quite a limp some days...since i rub this on twice daily, i can walk straight, no limp, no pain on walking....my knee isn't perfect, but this has taken away at least 85% of the pain on walking!
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: She used it for the 1st time while visiting for the holidays and loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Item was received in a timely manner and packaged well. This products works very well on my achy knees and sometimes sore muscles. My daughter in law asked where she could get some at Christmas. She used it for the 1st time while visiting for the holidays and loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Uzo

customer_reviews.title: Owies Fixed, no fuss
customer_reviews.text: This cream, which I have used for over 5 years since I found it is a marvelous product, Use it everywhere from mosquito bites to burns, itchy skin to sore chapped skin. Easly mixes with herbs and quickly absorbed into your skin to provide relief. Recommended, just one of those products you should always have at home, a 12-ounce pot lasts forever, this is my second purchase. They have many other great products. Check their website or here
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my mother who has really bad arthritis in her knees
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother who has really bad arthritis in her knees. She says that it hasn't helped much with the pain when she's walking, but where it has helped is when she's sitting or lying down...the pain has subsided a great deal. I'll take that as I'm sure she will as well!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: side by side comparison with Penetrex
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both Penetrex and Blue-Emu in order to compare products. Interesting results are I believe the Penetrex works best in terms of pain relief, but I prefer the Blue-Emu in terms of how it feels on my skin. The Penetrex has a slight more noticeable aroma, but both products are not offensive, no one will smell you coming!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No hint of pain relief, sorry
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give this a shot after using Hemp creams, just to try it out. This cream had ZERO pain relief. I waited and waited, hoping for some familiar warming tingling sensation. None came. This cream is basically an overpriced body butter. As a body butter it feels nice and has a pleasant texture, but it offers no pain relief - at least not for me. Perhaps the effect differs for different people and different pH, etc... so to not waste it, I am mixing it into my ol' reliable hemp cream to extend the life of the latter
customer_reviews.author: Irenie_K

customer_reviews.title: No Odor, No Pain Relief, No Results!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stuff based on the many positive reviews and convincing radio commercials I've heard. As a person in his mid-60`s I have my share of muscle aches and pains. The Blu-Emu didn't work for me and I have been using it occasionally for months. I bought the large container which was a waste of money. There is no warmth or feeling of relieve whatsoever with this product. This product doesn't work any better than a bottle of cheap hand lotion. I would recommend saving your money on this product and trying something else. Blu-Emu is very overrated!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Emu Aid is way better
customer_reviews.text: 'thought I'd skimp and get this much less expensive cream. Maybe it's fine for moisturizing and simple skin stuff, but the Emu-Aid brought immediate relief and healing to my skin problems. 'sorry I got this "alternative."
customer_reviews.author: W. Lae

customer_reviews.title: WISH IT WORKED LONGER
customer_reviews.text: HELPFUL ON THE SHORT RUN. YOU MUST USE IT EVERY 4 HOURS LIKE A PILL IN ORDER FOR IT TO BE VERY EFFECTIVE. FORMULA AND SMELL IS NICE.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleGirl2016

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how it works but it did for me. Ordering my 3rd jar. Have really bad arthritis in lower back and this relieved the pain to a manageable level. It may be real or a placebo but either way it works for me! Hope this was helpful. JGW Athens, AL
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my parents. They are 85 and 91, Have tried all types of products for the pain and achiness of arthritis. My Dad has a little finger that is totally stiff and caused him constant pain. Even creams prescribed by the doctor didn't help as much as the Blue-Emu. They swear by Blue Emu. Joints that previously hurt them continuously have either stopped or decreased in intensity that they are getting tremendous relief.
customer_reviews.author: Midge

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than other similar pain relief creams
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a five for scent because there was none, which I love. It only worked on my knees and ankles but not so much on hands. I did a research on CBD oils/topicals (not the hemp) and found they worked the best for everything. But the good CBD oil is expensive so I use this product on my knees and shoulders to help knock down overall cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Good Overall, Doesn't Work on Some Types of Pain
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't help all aches and pains... like the arthritis in my fingers, but does lessen the pain of my wife's fibromyalgia.
customer_reviews.author: Old Geezer

customer_reviews.title: This has not done anything noticeable for me. Joints ...
customer_reviews.text: This has not done anything noticeable for me. Joints are still in pain. I give it two stars because it indeed doesn't stink but other than that it does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Vitarelli

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how this product got such high ratings on Amazon. Totally useless as far as medicinal value I’m going back to bio freeze a product that actually works
customer_reviews.author: G. Luker

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Johnny Bench who??? Maybe it works for him, of course he got paid to say it does, but it doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Shotwell

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. Prayed it did. It is everything they describe, minus the pain relief. Used it for 2 weeks without any results.
customer_reviews.author: MARCUS

customer_reviews.title: Simply, it works!
customer_reviews.text: My profession as a Registered Nurse was skeptical. After working 12 hour shifts for 20plus years. I have developed atorn medial miniscus, bone on bone and floating osteophytes in my left knee. I’m very hesitant on getting surgery. I found Blue Emu. Simply it works! I will eventually need surgery but as a procrastinator this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Skulavik

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product especially with all the good reviews. I’ve used this for my lower back pain and shoulder pain. No relief whatsoever. Could have used regular moisturizer for the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Crazishopr

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product based on review in a popular magazine. I was skeptical but I gave it a shot. I have lower back pain that flares up on occasion. When it does, it shows in the morning, when my back hurts to the point where I can't just lounge in bed. I put this on right before going to bed. It works through the night and, allows my to lay in bed longer without back pain in the morning. It also has none of the spell you generally get with the analgesic products. We both use this, and our real happy with this product and the results. We would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: C&BTNJr.

customer_reviews.title: It works without any side effects
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for more than 10 years. This is the only cream that can release my pain without causing any skin allergy. I've tried many other kinds and they didn't work at all. Some of them even cause more pain and some of the doctor prescription cream and jell made my heart beats faster. I highly recommend it to those who skin problems
customer_reviews.author: Kwwalee

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Meet Pain Relief Expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an elderly relative hoping it would help ease the pain in her knee as a 'gift' to try. It really didn't do much for giving pain relief in her knee. I told her to try it on other areas of pain...she said it helped her a little more with other areas where she was experiencing lesser pain.
customer_reviews.author: Linda In Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Good seller. It works if you follow the directions
customer_reviews.text: Good seller. It works if you follow the directions. Saturate your problem area for a week or two before you pass judgement.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Great and fast pain killer.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, this is cheaper than if purchased at local stores! Hah? Makes me wonder! Non-drug infused or questionable contents: but from an emu? Main thing it works and fast -- who cares where it comes from? I tried many other products but this is the best yet! No opioids!

customer_reviews.title: A "keep on hand" product
customer_reviews.text: Works fast, even on deep ache. My son tried mine and went out and bought a big jar for himself at the drugstore (costs a little more there). Definitely a "keep on hand" product.
customer_reviews.author: haesten

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: OMG, this stuff is amazing. My husband and I both use it all the time. We've tried other products, but NOTHING works as well as Blue Emu. You want pain relief, you need to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE COLOR
customer_reviews.text: USED THIS FOR ONE WEEK FOR BAD RIGHT SHOULDER PAIN. DID NOTHING TO WARM THE AREA OR TO RELIVE THE PAIN. USED HEATING PAD FOR THREE DAYS AND ALL THE PAIN IS GONE. WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: E Mart

customer_reviews.title: I love blue emu
customer_reviews.text: I love blue emu, been using for a long time. Helps with pain and inflamation of sore knuckles and hands knees and feet and back. During a knee injury I needed more than emu so used with aspercreme and arnica and copaiba and then the pain was tolerable without having to take pain meds internally. But works just fine on my everyday hand aches
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: After eight hours of pulling weeds this product really helps to relieve the pain and soreness associated with weed pulling. It does not always stop the pain associated with overuse of the hands, but does do so enough that one is comfortable with the results. Yes, I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Knuckles were sore when I was in bed, so I used it to rub on my hands and pain went away - now I will put on my hands every nite B4 going to bed
customer_reviews.author: BOB - MEQUON,WI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Knee Pain
customer_reviews.text: I have severe osteoarthritis. While nothing at this point will completely relieve pain ( I need a knee replacement) it certainly helps. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A MIRACLE IN A JAR!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product since1990s? Sprains, arthritis, every ache and pain! 2012 I injured my shoulder Two surgeries left me disabled and in pain and misery. I stock piled every pain pill and cream on the market. NOTHING! Helped . Dug my Blu-emu out of cabinet and now pain free. By the way I'm 67. That's just part of the story.
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: My arthritis friend.
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad knees, as in bone on bone. I am a teacher and I am on my feet all day in the auto shop. I apply this in the morning at lunchtime. I find it works very effectively for me and I don’t have to take any pain medication.
customer_reviews.author: L. Harwell

customer_reviews.title: Great product would recommend for anybody suffering from joint stiffness and arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product a couple years ago and I love it. I have a extreme arthritis in many different joints and after applying this appointment IC relief.
customer_reviews.author: Myra G. McCulloch

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.. You should try it
customer_reviews.text: Wow this stuff has made all the difference for my shoulder... I used to get shots in my shoulder a few times a year. But now that I've been using this... No more need for shots
customer_reviews.author: Victor Barra

customer_reviews.title: Lasts for years, has a nice kind of strong scent, but NOT FOR SEVERE PAIN
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what's wrong with me, but my pain has gotten worse over the years. If you have pain like that, and know it's gotten even worse than what you considered severe years ago, maybe go with something else. If you do not, this is absolutely wonderful. I've used this for years, and so has most of my family.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Mohit
customer_reviews.text: It's not what I expected it needs more heat is kind of a dog I went back to my heating pad thank you. And back to the old smell Bengay bye ouch
customer_reviews.author: Great product love it

customer_reviews.title: Don't fall for it
customer_reviews.text: Just go get the 4 % lidocaine roll on rub from your pharmacy. This didn't relieve any pain at all
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Becker

customer_reviews.title: GIVE IT A TRY - YOU WON'T REGRET
customer_reviews.text: HAVE TENSION - KNOTS IN YOUR NECK FROM STRESS - MILD ARTHRITIS PAIN IN HANDS OR ANYWHERE. IT WORKS. HAVE EGG SIZE KNOTS IN NECK AT END OF A STRESSFUL DAY OF WORK - APPLY - SIT AND RELAX FOR 10 MINUTES THEN READY TO GO - KNOTS ARE GONE AND NO PAIN
customer_reviews.author: Spicy60s

customer_reviews.title: I reordered it in a larger size!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a completely fused back with a 25 inch scar. I had scoliosis. If you want to talk back pain I know exactly what you mean. I ordered 6 pained 12 relievers in order to get the best one. Were it not for Blue-Emu, I would be in a lot more pain. It really works for me out of the others I ordered. I will not be without it! I just ordered the 12 ounce jar!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: BEST pain reliever for my Fibromyalgia
customer_reviews.text: NO smell at all, fast absorbing and it actually WORKS. You need to put in on in the am, then at night again but it totally WORKS, and a small amount is all you need. Make sure you rub it in good. You will feel long lasting INSTANT relief! Again, DOES NOT HAVE A SCENT at ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Miracle blue cream
customer_reviews.text: Too good to be true but believe me personal experience it is true after rubbing it on within 10 minutes you get maximum relief you’re able to move in some cases you forget that you had the pain I recommend to anyone with muscle pains from your shoulder down to your feet
customer_reviews.author: Mother lioness

customer_reviews.title: Some Benefit But Not a Good Value
customer_reviews.text: For minor things I guess I could convince myself that it has some benefit, but it's not as good as the advertisements would lead you to believe. I switched to one of the house brand creams (like in a toothpaste tube) with asprin or latocain available at the grocery store - costs less, works better, and you won't stink.
customer_reviews.author: KennyG

customer_reviews.title: works if you are consistent
customer_reviews.text: Been using on arthritic knees, leaves my skin super soft, and seems to help reduce the inflammation over time. Need to use a few times per day and it takes a week to start noticing the improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn DumondTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Has always been effective for
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for about three years... Very effective in reducing if not taking away totally my knee pain... As well as minor arthritis in my hands. I have recommended it to a friend who has back problems, and was waiting for approval for an epidural... It reduced her pain significantly for a few hours, and she reapplied it and it worked for another few hours. It got her through several days waiting to be approved for the epidural.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: WOW This really works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all I have tried everything for my knee pain. Some have given me mild relief. I have osteoarthritis pretty bad and causes a great deal of pain. But WOW this stuff really does help. I’ve only used it for about I week but I can tell a difference. Much less pain and stiffness. No scent!! I was raving about it to my husband and he said here rub some on my arm. Sure hope it works for him as well as it did for me. Highly recommend trying!!
customer_reviews.author: vanessa withrow

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this product and said that it really works. I tried it and can't believe how much better my shoulder felt. It really works!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Seal broken
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure the product is good, but mine came with the seal opened.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Standish

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Did not help with arthritis at all. Gave me a rash.
customer_reviews.author: madamrich

customer_reviews.title: WHO knew EMU?
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Blue EMU because it advertises pain relief with out a smell, it was cheaper than the "Hemp" products and besides that I heard Richard Petty liked it! No scent and who knew this stuff would work as good as it does. Great to use after a long day at work or play. Rubs into the skin easy and goes to work almost un-noticed .... except the knee and shoulder is not nagging anymore. I recommend the BlueEMU.
customer_reviews.author: Art Layton

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, but emus die to make it.
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia and other issues that cause me pain. This works pretty good, but after I found out that emus are killed in order to make it, I felt bad. I don’t think I’ll buy it again. I have sensitivity to scents; this has a very, very light one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I received no benefit at all from this product. Shoulder pain remained exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L Winsor

customer_reviews.title: helps better than Australian dream and coasts Almost half
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this product, I tried the Australian dream, which coasts almost double and didn't really do much. As far as the blu emu - I find it to be very helpful for mild-moderate arthritis pain, but when I get severe pain, it doesn't do much. I gave it five stars anyway, because it's better than any other cream that I've tried, and because it does exactly what it's supposed to do - it gives relief to mild-moderate arthritis pain.
customer_reviews.author: Gili abro

customer_reviews.title: Better products in the wild
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give Blue Emu a try after being a long time Pene**** user. After about 10 applications of this product, I can definitely say that it is not worth the price savings over the competitor. The pain relief is just not there.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff just miss the burn
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works really good but you don't get the menthol bite you do with the maxfreeze and biofreeze. My daughter loves it. It feels just like putting kon lotion. It does not fully absorb quickly, so be careful with it before putting on nice clothes.
customer_reviews.author: JW320

customer_reviews.title: Don't need heavy pain meds.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pain relievers I've ever tried. After a surgery on my back the pain level was above a 10. My husband rubbed the cream on the area that I had just had surgery on and immediately I felt relief. It lasted several hours and he reapplied. It worked better than extreme high dossage of prescription pain drugs I was given . I ve told several friends and they too have had great success. I don't have to take the oxycodone. or the morphine that was prescribed for pain. Best ever.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Restless Legs!
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with restless legs almost every night. It’s so frustrating and exhausting. My mom recommended this blue emu cream so I gave it a try. I have been using it for a few months and when I put this on my restless legs are gone! I take it with me whenever I travel and it’s a godsend. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie H

customer_reviews.title: good product, works as described
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much it relieves muscle pain and tightness, most of all it is odorless. No more smelling like a hospital patient or someone being submerged in menthol.
customer_reviews.author: Teno Long

customer_reviews.title: Boo
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom to try out for her arthritis and she said it had zero effect for her and wanted me to return it. Boo:(
customer_reviews.author: @abadassforce

product_meta.title: Blue Emu Original Analgesic Cream, 12 Ounce (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: This special formula will soothe while penetrating deeply. Aloe vera based with Pure Johnson's Emu Oil, Glucosamine, MSM, vitamns A & E plus a Proprietary Blend of Natural Botanical Extracts. Hypo-allergenic; No known side effects; No odor
feature_bullets: Soothes Joints and Muscles, value Size
Apply liberally as needed, for best results, apply 2-3 times daily for 2 weeks, then as needed. Not approved for cuts. Do not use on open wounds.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
